mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Poetry of the Night
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Commanded by Rear Adm. Franziska Bosch. Database match: This vessel was lost without a trace during a patrol years ago. Specials: HET Warp AntiMine AntiTorp ShldDrain ShldReset LongRangeJump

set_ship_text.name: Krakatau
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Pride of TSN. Fitted with experimental anti-Caltron weaponry. Beware its deadly beams. Specials: Warp HET Teleport AntiCaltronEmitters

set_ship_text.name: Ubuntu
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Vessel of Madam President Kuyas Tolunay. Specials: Warp Teleport AntiMine AntiTorp

set_ship_text.name: Mistral
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Database match. Officially, Mistral is registered in USFP as an 'independent contractor'. However, there are accusations of corporate espionage and smuggling. Specials: HET AntiTorp ShldVamp Stealth

set_ship_text.name: Lucky Goldstar
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Lucky Goldstar is a flagship of Lucky Goldstar Ltd. - a non-government military organization. Specials: Teleport Teleback AntiMine Stealth

set_ship_text.name: Angelwing
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The Holy Barge of Their Holiness Prophet Clementus Sixtus the Fifth. Like all Budron vessels, it's entirely filled with water. Specials: HET AntiMine AntiTorp ShldVamp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Angelwing
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The Holy Barge of Their Holiness Prophet Clementus Sixtus the Fifth. Like all Budron vessels, it's entirely filled with water. Specials: HET AntiMine AntiTorp ShldVamp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Prophet Clementus
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The ship of an unknown Burin mammoth whale farmer, who would then go on to become Prophet Clementus.

set_ship_text.name: Rock Garden
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Starboard fission reactor breach. Fission reactor cementation in progress. H2O contamination levels are critical. Hull breach. H2O spill. Hazardous cargo spill.

set_ship_text.name: White Orchard
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Like all Budron vessels, it's entirely filled with water. Specials: HET Teleback Teleport AntiMine AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Unknown
set_ship_text.desc: Size similar to that of Ceres (Sol system). No database match.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The object radiates infrared energy. Spectroscopic analysis results suggest a profile similar to a class of stellar object known as an iron star. Hawking radiation detected towards the poles. Gravity at surface: 25G. More analysis required.

set_ship_text.name: Iron Moon
set_ship_text.desc: Caltron specimen discovered in Vilnara asteroid belt [see: Zu Chongzhi et al]. Size similar to that of Ceres (Sol system).
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The object radiates infrared energy. Spectroscopic analysis results suggest a profile similar to a class of stellar object known as an iron star. Hawking radiation detected towards the poles. Gravity at surface: 25G. Invulnerable to conventional weaponry. Exact properties unknown. Specials: ??? ???

set_ship_text.name: Metatron
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Close match to Iron Moon.

set_ship_text.name: 4ng3lw1ng
set_ship_text.desc: Database match. Budron Angelwing. Heavily upgraded Desolation-class Battlecruiser. The Holy Barge of Their Holiness Clementus Sixtus the Fifth.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Angelwing. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: HET AntiMine AntiTorp ShldVamp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Wh1te 0rchard
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of White Orchard. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: HET Teleback Teleport AntiMine AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: P037ry 0f t3h N1gh7
set_ship_text.desc: Database match. Unakhalai Poetry of the Night. Heavily modified TSN Dreadnought. Commanded by Rear Adm. Franziska Bosch.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Poetry of the Night. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: HET Warp AntiMine AntiTorp ShldDrain ShldReset LongRangeJump

set_ship_text.name: Kr4k4t4u
set_ship_text.desc: Database match. TSN Krakatau. Anti-Caltron superweapon. Pride of TSN. Fitted with experimental anti-Caltron weaponry. Beware its deadly beams.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Krakatau. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: Warp HET Teleport AntiCaltronEmitters

set_ship_text.name: 54b3r
set_ship_text.desc: Database match. TSN Sabre, the flagship of 2SF 4LD.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Sabre. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: Warp HET ShldVamp

set_ship_text.name: L4nc3r
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Lancer. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: LancerWarp HET

set_ship_text.name: 5c0rp10n
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Scorpion. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: Warp HET AntiMine AntiTorp

set_ship_text.name: H0r1z0n
set_ship_text.scan_desc: A near perfect replica of Horizon. Electromagnetic analysis matches the Caltron. No lifesigns detected. Specials: Warp HET Drones

set_ship_text.name: Black Billy
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Black Billy's warship. Crimes: piracy, hijacking, kidnapping, smuggling, illegal whaling, illegal dumping, deliberately interfering with wireless telegraphy, anti-social behavior, disorderly conduct. Specials: Warp HET AntiMine AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Mercedes
set_ship_text.scan_desc: One of the three Skull Sisters. Crimes: smuggling, human trafficking. Specials: Warp HET AntiTorp Drones

set_ship_text.name: Esmeralda
set_ship_text.scan_desc: One of the three Skull Sisters. Crimes: disorderly conduct, animal cruelty, loitering. Specials: Teleport Warp HET AntiTorp ShldVamp

set_ship_text.name: Constanza
set_ship_text.scan_desc: One of the three Skull Sisters. Crimes: burglary, quiet hours violation. Specials: Teleport HET AntiMine Teleback

set_ship_text.name: r
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Failed to open comms channel. Strong EM interference. Population status: unknown.

set_ship_text.name: r
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Failed to open comms channel. Strong EM interference. Population status: unknown.

set_ship_text.desc: Caltron specimen discovered in Vilnara asteroid belt [see: Zu Chongzhi et al]. Size similar to that of Ceres (Sol system).
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The object radiates infrared energy. Spectroscopic analysis results suggest a profile similar to a class of stellar object known as an iron star. Hawking radiation detected towards the poles. Gravity at surface: 25G. Invulnerable to conventional weaponry. Exact properties unknown. Specials: ??? ???

create.name: H 0 M O 5 4 P I E N S

set_ship_text.name: 0ffic3r's h4ndb0ok
set_ship_text.desc: The information contained within this handbook is intended to provide new and serving officers of the TSN with a clear reference and guide to serving as an officer in the Terran Stellar Navy. Information has been gathered into sections to enable officers to use the handbook for quick reference.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node hosts a primer for TSN officers.

set_ship_text.name: Int3l meet1ng 3623-2240
set_ship_text.desc: Stardate: 26823-2240. Attendance (mark with x if present). Xansta X, Kosai, Deadman, Tetra X, Pierce X, Garion, Quen, Rainbox X, Vaj, Fish. Summary of CIC operators (once mission discussion complete and CIC operators assigned) Simulation: Xansta Mission 1: Xavier Mission 2: Xavier Simulation: Deadman
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node contains top secret ONI intel documents for CIC operators.

set_ship_text.name: S3n10r off1cer's W4rdr0om
set_ship_text.desc: Terran Stellar Navy Comms' Hub.^ Meeting Room^ Fleet Captain's Quarters^ VIP Quarters
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node contains highly sensitive recordings between senior officers of TSN.

destroy.name: H 0 M O 5 4 P I E N S

set_ship_text.name: 4ttack Pat7erns
set_ship_text.desc: Attack/Evasive Patterns are focused on combat with enemy vessels. They are used for a captain to quickly communicate to their own crew how a particular engagement should be approached, whether taking a defensive or offensive approach, how aggressive the attack should be, as well as how the ship's manoeuvres and firing should be handled by the weapon and helms officer.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node serves a database of all TSN attack patterns and maneuvers.

set_ship_text.name: F1337 C0mm5 pr0tocol
set_ship_text.desc: The Fleet Communications Protocol document outlines the way in which ships operating together in a battlegroup, division or whole fleet should communicate with one another.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node contains documentation about TSN fleet communications protocol.

set_ship_text.name: Ba77legr0up f0rm4tion5
set_ship_text.desc: Formations are designed to coordinate the actions of several ships at a given time. They determine the positions of ships relative to one another, as well as the role that a specific ship will fulfil, whether supporting or leading the formation, and therefore how a captain should coordinate the actions of their own ship with the others in the same formation.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node hosts a data lake of TSN battlegroup formations.

set_ship_text.name: C0mm4nd 5y5tems
set_ship_text.desc: To generate the XML files of the TSN sandbox (i.e. the files used by Artemis), first run the MISS_TSN-Command.exe executable included in this repository. Select the systems and modules to be included in your sandbox. Finally, click Build to generate the XML files according to your settings.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node contains TSN Command Systems.

set_ship_text.name: H3rm3s Pr0xy
set_ship_text.desc: Windows builds are a pain as such there is a moderate chance they are out of date at any time (I will try to mark them when this is the case), if the size of the windows builds shrink quickly (currently 1.1MB) that is a sign starry has been an idiot and forgotten to link them statically ... again - fix that via either prodding starry or installing the MSVC runtime.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node hosts the Hermes Proxy.

set_ship_text.name: 4r73m15 53rv3r
set_ship_text.desc: Turn your living room into a spaceship bridge! Take on the jobs of Captain, Helm, Science, Communication, Engineering, and Weapon Control. Operate the ship together, and defend the sector from evil aliens.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: This node runs the Artemis Server.

set_ship_text.name: X
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Dating estimates:^Uranium-lead: 2.5 bln yrs.^Samarium-neodymium: 2.6 bln yrs^Rubidium-strontium: 2.55 bln yrs.^^Date consistent with prehistoric Budron tribal era.

set_ship_text.name: X
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Composition:^Water: 90%^Phosphorous: 8%^Other: 2%^^Chemical composition consistent with Burin Prime megaocean.

set_ship_text.name: X
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Similar to Terran Riftia pachyptila (Siboglinidae) also known as tubeworms. These organisms live around thermal vents deep underwater.^Consistent with early Burin lifeforms.

set_ship_text.name: Burin Prime
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Tectonic plates layout consistent with the period of early Budron expansion, soon after they became a spacefaring race.

set_ship_text.name: Iron Moon remnant
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Iron Moon was a hollowed-out iron star, which collapsed after its central 'nervous' system was purged.
